pkgmetadata.longdescription: # HSTGRISMWebpage: https://bkornpob.github.io/hstgrism/## 8.5.0- contamination.py: introducing 'configuration'- wfc3uvisg280.py- sub2full.py## 8.4.0- contamination.py- grismapcorr.py added min and max wavelength columns to the tables in order to force the code performing nearest neighbour extrapolation.## 8.3.0- headersummary.py## 8.2.0WFC3IRG141 is introduced.## 8.1.0ObjectMask is introduced.
